verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Sadaka yetu Bwana twaomba upokee ni mazao ya mashamba yetu eeh Baba upokee.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: 1.Mkate na Divai na pia nafsi zetu ni zawadi yetu kwako ee Baba upokee.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: 2. Na fedha za mifukoni mazao ya mashamba Ee Baba ni kazi zetu twaomba upokee

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: 3.Pokea na nyoyo zetu miili yetu pia Ee Baba utupokee tulio wana wako.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: 4.Pokea tunakuomba ingawa ni kidogo kwa unyenyekevu Baba tunavileta kwako
